A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
for an epic story\, and we got this diluted\, confusing mess.

Zero character development. No questions answered. Luke's character and story arc disgraced. So many puzzlingly out of place and uninteresting new characters introduced. A series of mini plots that aside from being silly or pointless\, were just kinda boring.

This movie felt like it went in a giant circle - I'm not sure how it moved the overall story forward. I'd love to believe that the next installment could redeem this one\, but no matter how good it is I don't think it's possible. The Last Jedi ruined this trilogy for me.
